datasets.definition: CREATE DATASET adminData ON concourse_qa WHERE `_type` IN ['accelerator','automation','template','intSol','archetype'];
datasets.name: adminData

datasets.definition: CREATE DATASET workspaceData ON concourse_qa WHERE `_type` IN ['engagement','engagementAccelerator','engagementAutomation','engagementTemplate','userEngagement','workstream'];
datasets.name: workspaceData

datasets.definition: CREATE DATASET systemData ON concourse_qa WHERE `_type` IN ['user'];
datasets.name: systemData
